name: Għerq Sinjur
description:
English

Għerq Sinjur is a top down bullet hell game made in 10 days for GBJam10. Players play as a Maltese commoner in 1777, living under the rule of the Knights Hospitaller. With a parent falling ill, you must head to Gozo to obtain a sample of Għerq Sinjur, a plant that is said to contain powerful healing capabilities, while dodging any attempts by the Knights to stop you.

Control Scheme: Arrow Keys to move around, X key to select

Content Warnings: parental illness

Malti

Għerq Sinjur hija lgħajba top down u bullet hell magħmula f'10 ijiem għal GBJam 10. Minn jilgħab jieħu r-rwol ta' Malti komuni fis-sena 1777 taħt il-ħakma tal-Kavallieri ta' San Ġwann. Bil-mard ta' ġenitur, jeħtieġ li terħila lejn Għawdex biex tiġbor ftit mill-pjanta Għerq Sinjur, li jgħidu li għanda saħħa qawwija kontra l-mard, filwaqt li taħrab u tiżġiċċa l-Kavallieri li qed jippruvaw iwaqqfuk.

Biex Tilgħab: Arrow Keys biex timxi, X biex tagħżel xi ħaġa

Twissijiet dwar il-Kontenut: ġenituri morda
